name: UploadAssortmentProducts
description:
Performs a bulk update of an assortment's products.
The data for this service can be gotten by first calling DownloadAssortmentProducts, then make your changes and reupload it using this service.

properties.name: DeleteMissing
properties.description: When a product is currently part of the assortment but is not present in the Excel that is uploaded, it's removed from the assortment.
